title: In 2 weeks will I believe it’s more likely than not that Tim Walz made false statements about his military career?
body:
I’ve seen that Stolen Valor claims have been making the rounds, but also people have made counterpoints to them. I’d say that I’m at like 70% Walz has been honest, even though I haven’t really looked into it, since my prior is that conservatives have a history of lying/misleading about their political opponents.

Anyways, that leaves me open to be convinced that the fraud is real, but the burden is definitely on folks who think it is. Resolves YES in 2 weeks if I believe that Walz more likely than not has made false statements about his military career. Otherwise, resolves NO.

I suspect that this should be clear cut (won’t be super close to the border of 50% certainty), so I hope the probability tracks with the chance that the claims are true.

I will not bet in this market.

title: Best Residential Projects in Gurugram
body:
OSB Group - Affordable Housing Projects Gurugram 

Ocean Seven Buildtech (OSB) is a significant aspect of their business model. Sustainable development in the context of real estate typically involves incorporating environmentally friendly practices, energy efficiency, and a focus on long-term viability. Here are some potential aspects of sustainable development that OSB might prioritize:

Green Building Practices: OSB may incorporate green building techniques that aim to reduce the environmental impact of construction and promote energy efficiency. This could involve the use of eco-friendly materials, energy-efficient appliances, and sustainable construction methods.

Energy Efficiency: Implementing energy-efficient technologies and practices in buildings, such as the use of solar panels, energy-efficient lighting, and heating, ventilation, and air conditioning (HVAC) systems, can contribute to a more sustainable approach.

Waste Reduction: Minimizing construction and operational waste is another key element of sustainable development. This might involve recycling materials, reducing water consumption, and adopting waste management practices that prioritize environmental responsibility.

Green Spaces and Landscaping: OSB may focus on creating green spaces and incorporating landscaping that enhances biodiversity and contributes to a healthier environment for residents.

Community Engagement: Sustainable development often involves engaging with the local community. OSB may work closely with local stakeholders, involve the community in decision-making processes, and contribute to the overall well-being of the area in which they operate.

Certifications: Obtaining certifications such as Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design (LEED) or other relevant sustainability certifications can demonstrate OSB's commitment to environmentally friendly practices.

title: Will OpenAI announce or release something related to Project Strawberry (Q*) in the next 72 hours?
body:
The Twitter/X account of iruletheworldmo claims that OpenAI is going to release something related to Project Strawberry in the next few hours.

[tweet]This is likely just a shitposting account, but I still find it funny to create a market about this.

Resolves as YES:

OpenAI announces or releases anything related to Project Strawberry (Q*) within the time frame from 16:30 PDT August 7 to 16:30 PDT August 10 (72 hours). This must be from official sources (like a blog post, Sam Altman, or similar).

If something is released within this time window but the relation to Strawberry (Q*) is unclear, I may close trading in the market for a maximum of 2 months, waiting for evidence to confirm or discard any relation.

Resolves as NO:

Nothing is released or announced within the 72-hour time window.

Something is released or announced, but it is clear beyond doubt that it has nothing to do with Project Strawberry (Q*).

Something is released or announced, but the relation to Project Strawberry (Q*) is unclear, so the market has trading closed for a maximum of 2 months while waiting for more evidence, and at some point, the evidence is enough to conclude there is no relation.

After 2 months of waiting for more evidence to conclude the relation to Project Strawberry (Q*), there wasn't enough, so it resolves to NO by default.

OP Trading: Given the objective nature of this market’s resolution, I reserve the right to place bets. However, I will do so only after at least 5 trades or trade orders from different traders have been made to avoid any unfair advantage.

Will there be a break between Chainsaw Man chapters 174 and 175?
body:
A break can be any amount of time, enough for Shonen Jump to state at the end of chapters if there will be a break before the next one.

“YES” = “Yes, there will be a break after chapter 174”

“NO” = “No, there will not be a break after chapter 174”

Plan to close this on official release, will close earlier if known-accurate leakers post any details about a break ahead of time. I do not vote in my own questions.

content.text: A break can be any amount of time, enough for Shonen Jump to state at the end of chapters if there will be a break before the next one.

title: Will I participate in the def/acc program at Entrepreneur First?
body:
I just had an initial call with Matt Clifford, who is running def/acc, an accelerator (heh) for people building defensive/differential technology. It's a program that runs for something like 4-24 weeks in London, bringing together a cohort of folks to incubate a new company. Will I end up participating?

Why yes

Matt himself is very cool, started the UK AISI and AI Safety Summit; I feel like I could learn a lot from him personally

I liked the concept of d/acc a bunch when I first saw Vitalik's post on it

I like the idea of being heads down, in an environment focused on delivering, with a peer group of technical folks excited by the same concepts as me

And the idea of resetting, or being on retreat for a bit

Why no/hesitations

Ada is 1 month old; spending a lot of time away might be hard on her or Rachel

Though Matt says we could winnow down to a trial period to like 4 weeks, which is much more palatable than 12.

8% seems like a lot of equity to give up?

Manifold never went through an accelerator (though we would definitely have done YC at 7%, if we'd been accepted)

Some kind of weird pride/mentality around "oh accelerators are for less experienced folks" or "I can do it all myself", which I don't think I actually endorse

Before the call today, I'd put myself at like a 20-25% chance of going through; after speaking to Matt and learning a bit more about def/acc's structure and goals, I'm up to 40-50%, as of this writing. Would love to hear y'alls thoughts (esp if you have any experience with Entrepreneur First, Matt himself or his initiatives).

PS What would I work on? Could be...

A for-profit extension of the Manifund platform/mission

Something around making LLM-based coding ubiquitous/accessible to non-programmers

Something around the financial/contractual ecosystem for agents

title: Will Intel stock (INTC) fall below $19.00 USD in August 2024?
body:
"Intel shares plunged the most in 50 years on Friday, reaching a price not seen since 2013, after the chipmaker reported a big earnings miss and announced a massive restructuring.

The stock plummeted 27% to $21.22 as of late morning trading. It would be the second worst day ever for the shares, behind only a 31% drop in July 1974, which was three years after Intel’s IPO. The company’s market cap is now below $100 billion.

The dramatic selloff contributed to a 2.4% drop in the Nasdaq and pulled down global semiconductor stocks. Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. — known as TSMC — closed 4.6% lower in Taiwan, and Samsung was down more than 4% at the end of the session in South Korea. TSMC is the world’s biggest manufacturer of chips, while Samsung is the largest memory semiconductor firm globally.

Intel’s numbers were bad across the board..." 
https://www.cnbc.com/2024/08/02/intel-share-plunge-drags-down-global-chip-stocks-from-tsmc-to-samsung.html

Intel is also having negative PR from big tech youtubers due to their CPU failures and allegedly shady/dishonest conduct

[image][image]Will the stock fall to even more historic lows of 19.00 USD in August 2024? Afterhours and pre-market hours count.

title: Will it come to light that RFK Jr. caused the death of the bear cub?
body:
Currently there's a minor scandal involving RFK Jr. where he claims to have found a bear cub hit by someone else's car, driven it to Central Park, and left it, for... complicated reasons:

https://www.cnn.com/2024/08/04/politics/rfk-jr-bear-central-park/index.html

I think there's a possibility he's trying to get ahead of a scandal whereby he himself will be the one accused of causing the death of the bear cub.

This resolves based on the preponderance of evidence (>50% likelihood).  I will use my own judgment to resolve it, and will consult with other respectable Manifold users if necessary.  If it's truly intractable to resolve based on a preponderance of evidence, I will consider resolving to 50% or a PROB, but I would strongly prefer to resolve YES or NO.

As to how broadly I will consider what it means to "cause the death" of the bear cub, I will try to resolve in the spirit of the question.  If RFK Jr. is hiding his role in the bear cub's death and it turned out he played even a minor role (swerved into traffic and another car hit it, or something like this) I will likely resolve YES.

I've set the resolution time for a month from now, but I will extend the date if necessary to reach a good conclusion!

I will obviously not bet in this market, so as to remain unbiased about the resolution.

body:
Resolution 

This market resolves YES "It Ends with Us" has a higher (domestic) gross than "Deadpool & Wolverine" for the weekend of August 9-11.

I will use the number listed by BoxOfficeMojo, however it is defined (e.g. typically 3-day FSS wekeend + previews).

"Deadpool & Wolverine" has been crushing the box office, and is expected to repeat with its 3rd weekend at #1. 

The potential long shot that could dethrone it is "It Ends With Us", the adaptation of Colleen Hoover's mega-bestseller, starring (funnily enough) Ryan Reynold's wife, Blake Lively.

body:
Clone of https://polymarket.com/event/us-evacuates-beirut-embassy-by-august-31

This market will resolve to "Yes" if the U.S. government announces a full evacuation of the U.S. Embassy in Beirut, Lebanon, or a full evacuation is otherwise confirmed by August 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No."

A full evacuation announced within this markets time frame will qualify for a "Yes" resolution regardless of whether an actual evacuation subsequently takes place within the market's timeframe.

Announcements of a partial evacuation, where some staff are intended to remain, will not count.

The resolution source will be official statements from the U.S. government, or a consensus of credible reporting confirming the evacuation of the embassy.

title: Iran military response by Sunday?
body:
Clone of https://polymarket.com/event/iran-military-response-by-sunday

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Iran initiates a military action on Israeli soil, airspace, or maritime territory between August 1 and August 4, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purposes of this market, a "military action" will be considered to be any use of force executed by Iran on Israeli soil, airspace, or maritime territory (e.g. if a weapons depot on Israeli soil is hit by an Iranian missile, this market will resolve to "Yes") that is officially acknowledged by the Iranian government or a consensus of credible reporting. This includes, but is not limited to, airstrikes, naval attacks, or ground invasions. Cyber attacks, sanctions, or diplomatic actions will not count towards the resolution of this market.

Only responses by Iranian forces explicitly claimed by the Islamic Republic of Iran, or confirmed to have originated from Iranian territory will count toward the resolution of this market. Attacks on Israel by proxy forces (i.e. Hezbollah, Houthis, etc.) will not count toward the resolution of this market.

Resolves identically to the Polymarket market.

title: Wii the  S&P 500 stock index close higher on Aug 9 than it closed on Aug 2-- 5346.56?
Iran military response by the end of today? (August 2)
body:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Iran initiates a military action on Israeli soil, airspace, or maritime territory between July 30 and August 2, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purposes of this market, a "military action" will be considered to be any use of force executed by Iran on Israeli soil, airspace, or maritime territory (e.g. if a weapons depot on Israeli soil is hit by an Iranian missile, this market will resolve to "Yes") that is officially acknowledged by the Iranian government or a consensus of credible reporting. This includes, but is not limited to, airstrikes, naval attacks, or ground invasions. Cyber attacks, sanctions, or diplomatic actions will not count towards the resolution of this market.

Only responses by Iranian forces explicitly claimed by the Islamic Republic of Iran, or confirmed to have originated from Iranian territory will count toward the resolution of this market. Attacks on Israel by proxy forces (i.e. Hezbollah, Houthis, etc.) will not count toward the resolution of this market.

In the case that the "Yes" resolution criteria are met prior to this market's resolution date, this market will resolve immediately.

title: Will Kamala say context in August?
body:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if Kamala Harris publicly mentions the word "context" between August 1, 4:00 PM ET and August 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

Pluralization/possessive of the word will count toward the resolution of this market.

A ‘mention’ includes the following:

-A verbal usage of the word "context" which is recorded (audio or video) and publicly accessible.
-Any written usage of the word "context" published through Kamala's social media or other official communication channels regardless of capitalization (@KamalaHarris and @VP, would qualify however @KamalaHQ will not count).

Videos posted on her social media which were filmed outside this market's time frame will not qualify for a "Yes" resolution.

title: Whale vs. Minnows: Will the Masters League winner outearn all Bronze League division winners combined for August 2024?
body:
@jacksonpolack stood at the top of the legendary Masters League. Triumphant. Victorious. For, just a few moments ago, they had retained the mythical Mantic Throne with a monumental Ṁ688,459 in play-money earnings.

Jackson sat down and reveled in the moment, dusting off a stray speck of Mana stuck to their business suit. Drifting mesmerizingly back and forth, it slowly disappeared into the darkness below.

And as it fell, it grew ever heavier.

Ever larger.

Ever solider.

Suddenly, the Mana struck the bottom of Bronze League with a hard clink.

At first, silence. Then, the voices of one, then two, then dozens of traders filled the void:

"Mine! Mine! Mine!"

---

Welcome to August.

Manifold leagues allow traders to compete against one another during a season, ranking them by the sum of their profits (realized and unrealized) and their market creator earnings. I'll call this sum earnings for simplicity.

Masters League is Manifold's highest league, where the site's most esteemed predictors compete against one another for the top spot. It has only one division. Bronze League is Manifold's lowest league, where all new users begin their Manifold journey. It has many divisions (85 in July).

The August league season (Season 16) will run during the course of August, ending at a random time on September 1 in the Pacific time zone.

This market resolves YES if, at season's end, the winner of Masters League has more earnings (see above) than the combined earnings of all Bronze League division winners. (It doesn't have to be Jackson again, although they could three-peat.)

This market resolves NO if, at season's end, the combined earnings of all Bronze League division winners outweigh the Masters League winner's earnings.

This market resolves 50% each to YES and NO if there is a tie.

I will take earnings as listed in https://manifold.markets/leagues, meaning users' earnings are rounded to integers.

I will not bet on this market.

title: Will Biden be declared incapacitated under the 25th Amendment Section 4 before September?
body:
Resolves YES if Section 4 of the 25th Amendment is formally invoked, declaring that "the President is unable to discharge the powers and duties of his office" and causing the Vice President to serve as Acting President, before the above date (Eastern time).

The duration of the incapacity does not matter for this question.

Biden exiting the office of the Presidency by death, resignation, etc does not count. Biden invoking section 3 of the 25th amendment does not count.

title: Will Biden be hospitalized overnight before September 2024?
body:
Resolves YES if Biden is admitted to a hospital before the end of the month and stays overnight. Otherwise NO.

Elaboration of resolution criteria

Medical care at a hospital without an overnight stay would not count as YES.

If Biden is admitted on the last day of the month and stays overnight through the 1st, that counts as YES.

title: Will Trump fire Chris LaCivita before Labor Day?

Former President Donald Trump churned through many campaign managers and strategists (including Corey Lewandowski, Paul Manafort, Kellyanne Conway, Steve Bannon, Brad Parscale, and Bill Stepien).  

Will Trump fire Chris LaCivita as "co-campaign manager" by 11:59pm ET on September 1, 2024?  The resolution sources are (a) an American 'major outlet' referenced here, (b) all official campaign websites and social media channels, or (c) any Trump communication, press release, tweet, truth, or statement.

Firing, dismal, taking a leave of absence, resignation, reassigning to a PAC, or leaving the campaign for any reason will count as YES.  "Layering" or hiring a new strategist above LaCivita will not count. His position as COO to the RNC is irrelevant to this question. If there is uncertainty about LaCavita's status with the Trump campaign, the market creator will use best judgement to resolve the question.


The market creator will not trade in this market. The market will not resolve as a percentage under any circumstances.

title: Will Maduro / CNE change their suspicious vote totals to something else by end of August?
body:
Nicolas Maduro, president of Venezuela, has fraudulently declared victory in his election. He and his team say that he got 51.2%, his main opponent Gonzalez got 44.2%, and others got 4.6%. (He really got 30ish, I think.)

The problem: with the vote totals they published, if you give the percentages to more decimal places, you get 51.20000, 44.20000, and 4.60000. In fact, they’re what you’d get if you decided there would be 10058774 total votes, the split would be 51.2 / 44.2 / 4.6, and you rounded to the nearest integer. The chance this happened coincidentally: 1 in 100 million. 

Now, perhaps Maduro and CNE don’t care about this anomaly. But there’s one thing they could claim: They started with more plausible vote counts, calculated the percentages, and someone on their team incorrectly multiplied to publish the vote counts again - in other words, this was not fraud, but sloppiness. 

Resolves YES if, by end of August, these vote counts are officially retracted and new ones are published (even if Maduro still wins).

https://statmodeling.stat.columbia.edu/2024/07/31/suspicious-data-pattern-in-recent-venezuelan-election/

General policy for my markets: In the rare event of a conflict between my resolution criteria and the agreed-upon common-sense spirit of the market, I may resolve it according to the market's spirit or N/A, probably after discussion.

title: Will Nicolás Maduro's government produce non-obviously fake voting records supporting a Maduro win until 8/31?
body:
Venezuela's opposition leader María Corina Machado has claimed to have enough voting records to prove that the opposition candidate Edmundo González won the election in Venezuela and that the victory claimed by Nicolás Maduro is fraudulent: https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2024-07-29/venezuela-s-machado-says-opposition-has-enough-proof-of-fraud

Machado has made the claimed results available online at: https://resultadospresidencialesvenezuela2024.com/

This market aims to predict whether the Maduro government will produce its own, contradicting set of voting records, supporting Maduro's claimed 51% win.

The produced records need not be proven to be legitimate within the given timeframe, as the legitimacy of any records will likely be a matter of significant contention. It is, however, required that the produced records are consistent with the win claimed by Maduro and that they are sufficiently believable for international observers to consider it a legitimate topic of discussion by the international community whether Maduro really won (i.e. if Maduro just produces obviously fraudulent records, this will resolve NO).

I will hold off on resolving this market if there is significant disagreement over whether the voting records produced by the government, in case they are produced at all, are obviously fraudulent or not.

title: Will Kamala Harris’s "Brat Summer" carry through till November?
body:
A "Rascal Autumn" if you will?

Kamala Harris’s "Brat Summer" has generated significant buzz, but the key question is whether this momentum will sustain until November. 

The term "Brat Summer" refers to singer Charli xcx's latest album titled 'Brat'. It's reference to a time of fun and messy mistakes but 'owning' the summer. In our sense it refers to the period when Harris has been prominent in the media and public eye, and increased popularity primarily amongst Gen Z. This has created new enthusiasm amongst the democratic base and increased hopes about a Dem win in November, but will it last?

title: Will we hire a backend engineer by the end of August?
body:
Manifold has seen an uptick in activity since the first presidential debate. On some days, the number of trades has doubled compared to the previous baseline.

We'll soon be launching sweepstakes cash prizes, which we think will further drive demand in a big way. And, the US Election in November will probably be the biggest surge in activity we've ever seen.

So, we are considering hiring a backend engineer to help us scale.

Reasons to hire:

Improve site stability and performance, especially during peak times

Give us more time to improve the product rather than fighting fires in the database / server

Improve Manifold's collective backend knowledge and teach our team members best practices

Have one more person available if an incident happens

We've already had one promising candidate reach out.

Here's our job posting, for an in-person role in our SF office:

Lead backend engineer

Signs you may be a good fit

4+ years experience with backend systems

Deep familiarity with databases like Postgres, deploying servers, and maintaining them on a cloud provider like GCP

Strong technical design abilities from multi-server architectures to database schemas

Responsibilities

Own critical systems including our entire trading infrastructure, API layer, and database

Able to work independently and flexibly to accomplish Manifold's goals

For compensation, you can see what we're currently paying each of our team members here.

If you are interested in applying, please email jobs@manifold.markets with your resume / LinkedIn, or find time to chat with James here.

title: Will the U.S. economy have a soft landing (Dec/2025)?
body:
This market will settle to YES if the June 2024 readings of Core PCE Inflation and Unemployment (defined by the BLS) read as the following:

CPI Inflation excluding Food and Energy in U.S. City Average is below 2.75% YoY in the December 2025 reading

CPI Inflation excluding Food and Energy is above 1% YoY in the December 2025 reading

The Real-time Sahm Rule isn't triggered at any point until (employment-rate increase 50bps above the recent 6-month low), including January 2026.

The National Bureau of Economic Research doesn't call a recession starting at point until December 31st 2025.

I will resolve this market when the Bureau of Labor Statistics reports the inflation numbers for December 2025, in January 2026. If the National Bureau of Economic Research in a later date declares a recession starting in 2025, the result of this market won't change.

Will my flight (originally BZ441 on August 8, BUD to TLV, now BZ117) be canceled, because of war with Iran or otherwise?
body:
I have a ticket booked to fly to Israel on August 8th. If serious war with Hezbollah or Iran breaks out, flights may be cancelled. Will mine be?

For ease of resolution, this question is about if my flight is cancelled at all, without direct reference to the cause.

The primary resolution criterion is my personal experience. If I go to the airport, board the plane, and it lands in Israel (even with a delay), then this resolves NO. If I attempt to do that but am told the flight is cancelled, this resolves YES. Otherwise (such as if I decide to change my plans and fly a different day), this resolves based on what online flight tracker websites say (about the status of BZ441/BZ117 on 08/08/2024.)

Clarification: If the flight is cancelled mid-air, landing somewhere not in Israel and not then continuing on to Israel, I'll resolve this YES.

title: Will the French gov release an official statement addressing the negative reception of the Olympic Opening Ceremony?
body:
Yesterday, the 2024 Summer Olympics opened in Paris with a 4-hour Opening Ceremony. While the boat parade and singers seemed to have a good reception, there were parts of the show that have led to public outcry from some people. 

Specifically, a portion of the show was a drag performance that included a 'recreation' of Da Vinci's The Last Supper. For a variety of reasons (see below) there are people who are put-off, offended, angry, and more.

So far, the French Government has praised only the security forces, reporting "no incidents" at the 300,000 person ceremony. Will they release an official statement addressing - either acknowledging the controversy, apologizing, refusing to apologise, explaining why they chose this segment of the performance, etc - the response?

Close date is 1-week post-closing ceremony (happening Aug 11, Paris local time). If a statement comes before then, resolves yes. Otherwise, no.

Must be an official and direct statement from within the French Parliament or bodies related to the event (such as the organization committee). One-off quotes from people with a government title will likely not resolve this market - if it's a personal/individual opinion or mention, it's not an official statement.

Tracing Woodgrains posted this tweet thread, saying "I hated this performance and think it brought shame on the entire country of France."

A user posted this video clip from the show to twitter, currently at nearly 900k views, calling the performance "disrespectful toward many athletes."

"Mocking God" is trending, and there are any number of tweets you can find about this so I'll save an exhaustive list.

Articles:

NYPost: Apparent drag ‘parody of Last Supper’ at Paris 2024 Olympics opening ceremony sparks controversy

News.com.au: Aussie legend slams ‘demonic’ detail in opening ceremony that upsets billions

(NPR skipped over this part in their summary)

NPR: An ambitious Olympics opening ceremony showboats French culture on the Seine River

Daily Mail: Christians slam Paris Olympics for woke parody of the Last Supper during bizarre opening ceremony dubbed the 'worst ever' - mired by technical hitches and the weather that was only saved by Celine Dion

Will someone beat my quickest solution to a Magic the gathering deck building puzzle?
body:
Here is the puzzle:

Assume Oswald Fiddlebender is your commander, and the card Mechtitan Core is somewhere in your library. Your opponents do literally nothing but pass each turn (you have three). You can guarantee you start with an artifact of mana value X and mana value Y (X and Y can be the same or different) in your opening hand, but you can only gurantee the mana value, not any specific card (treat the card as though it has no text besides mana value and artifact). The rest of your hand is empty. You draw a basic plains or snow plains (your choice) each turn, commander rules, and you can have any legal commander card in your library. Extra turns don't count as turns. What’s the fastest you could possibly get Mechtitan out?

The rules here are trying to capture the spirit of building a deck around consistently getting out mechtitan fast, I'm willing to accept a bend here or there if this is maintained. For solutions that involve milling/exiling/whatever to a card, if it’s consistent it’s fine.


My turn 5 solution:
In my case, I'll start with artifact of mana value 1 and another artifact with mana value 1.

Turn one: Play a land and cast one mana artifact.

Turn two: Play a land and play Oswald.

Turn three: Play a land, spend one mana to tap and sac the one mana artifact. Find Magewright’s stone, pay one to tap magewrights to untap oswald. Pay one more to tap Oswald, sac magewright's, to find Thousand Year Elixir. 

Turn 4: Play a land and another 1 mana artifact (my second guaranteed mana value). Tap oswald and sac the one mana artifact to find Mechtitan Core. Tap thousand year elixir to untap oswald. Tap oswald and sac thousand year elixir and find Canoptek Scarab Swarm. Since my graveyard now has 4 artifacts (two one mana ones, Magewrights, and Thousand Year) I will target my own graveyard with Canoptek Scarab Swarm’s ETB ability, exiling my graveyard and creating 4 1/1 insect artifact creatures. 

Turn 5: Play a land, activate Mechtitan Core for Mechtitan!

I wanted to do this as a bounty but I guess manifold doesn't have those anymore? Anyways, I'll tip 1k mana to the first person who beats me, if it's possible! For context: I've played with Oswald and Mech Core a ton, but don't often play with super high power cards so thinking I might get caught off guard.

Ok well that was quick. I’ll put another 1k bounty if you can do it without extra turns and another 1k for a fast mana solution in three turns or less, where you guarantee that you start with fast mana (one more white mana turn one?)

title: JD Vance Replaced as Republican VP before September?
body:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if JD Vance officially announces his withdrawal or is confirmed to have withdrawn from his candidacy for Vice President in the 2024 US election by 11:59 PM ET on August 31, 2024.

In the event of any extenuating circumstances that prevent JD Vance from continuing the race, this market will also resolve to "Yes".

If JD Vance does not announce his withdrawal or is not forced to withdraw from the 2024 presidential race by the specified time, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from JD Vance or his official/legal representatives, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

title: Will JD Vance say "Couch" before August?
body:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if J.D. Vance publicly mentions the word "Couch" between July 25, 5:30 PM ET and July 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No."

Pluralization/possessive of the word will count toward the resolution of this market.

A 'mention' includes the following:

-A verbal usage of the word "Couch".
-Any written usage of the word "Couch" published through J.D. Vance's social media or other official communication channels regardless of capitalization (@JDVance would qualify however @SenVancePress will not count).

Videos posted on his social media which were filmed outside this market's time frame will not qualify for a "Yes" resolution.

The first 5 minutes of this markets life won't count, since all markets start at 50% that would not be fair otherwise.

title: This market has a 80% chance of resolving N/A, a 15% chance of resolving YES, and a 5% chance of resolving NO.
body:
Shortly after this market closes, I will tag @FairlyRandom for a number between 1 and 100. If it picks a number between 1 and 80 inclusive, this market will resolve N/A. If it picks a number between 81 and 95 inclusive, this market will resolve YES. If it picks a number between 96 and 100 inclusive, this market will resolve NO.

In other words, this market has an 80% chance of resolving N/A. Conditional on that not happening, this market has a 75% chance of resolving YES and a 25% chance of resolving NO.

The purpose of this market is to observe how traders handle conditional markets with unlikely conditionals.

In other words, this market has an 80% chance of resolving N/A. Conditional on that not happening, this market has a 75% chance of resolving YES and a 25% chance of resolving NO.

title: [Metaculus] Will SpaceX's Super Heavy booster make contact with the catch tower during the l...integrated flight test 5?
body:
Will SpaceX's Super Heavy booster make contact with the catch tower during the landing phase of Starship integrated flight test 5?

Resolves the same as the original on Metaculus.

(https://www.metaculus.com/questions/question_embed/26170/?theme=dark)Resolution criteria

This question will resolve as Yes if, during integrated flight test 5 (IFT-5), SpaceX attempts to catch the first stage of Starship, the Super Heavy booster, with a launch and catch tower, and the booster makes contact with the tower during the landing attempt. If no such attempt and contact is made during IFT-5, the question will resolve as No. If IFT-5 does not occur before October 1, 2024, the question will be annulled.

Fine print and additional background information can be found on Metaculus.

Once the original resolves, its resolution will be applied to this market automatically. Trustworthy-ish users are encouraged to resolve this market before then if the outcome is known and unambiguous. Feel free to ping @jskf to request early resolution or to report issues.

title: [Metaculus] Will diplomatic expulsions or recalls take place between the Philippines and China before August 1, 2024?
body:
Will diplomatic expulsions or recalls take place between the Philippines and China before August 1, 2024?

Resolves the same as the original on Metaculus.

(https://www.metaculus.com/questions/question_embed/24034/?theme=dark)Resolution criteria

This question resolves as Yes if before August 1, 2024, one of these four events happens, according to official statements or credible reports:

The Philippines expels at least one diplomat representing the People's Republic of China (PRC).

The Philippines recalls at least one of its diplomats stationed in the PRC.

The PRC expels at least one diplomat representing the Philippines.

The PRC recalls at least one of its diplomats stationed in the Philippines.

If there are no such reports before that date, then this resolves as No.

title: If Trump is elected, will he abolish the tax on tips?
body:
Abolish means that cash tips are taxed at 0% for most workers. The 0% applies to the federal income and payroll tax.

This can be in the form of "100 percent above-the-line deduction for cash tip income" or a tax credit, or something else in the tax code.

A break can be any amount of time, enough for Shonen Jump to state at the end of chapters if there will be a break before the next one.

“YES” = “Yes, there will be a break after chapter 173”

“NO” = “No, there will not be a break after chapter 173”

Plan to close this on official release, will close earlier if known-accurate leakers post any details about a break ahead of time. I do not vote in my own questions.

title: Will Kamala say "Brat" before August?
body:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if Kamala Harris publicly mentions the word "Brat" between July 23, 7:00 PM ET and July 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

Pluralization/possessive of the word will count toward the resolution of this market.

A ‘mention’ includes the following:

-A verbal usage of the word "Brat".
-Any written usage of the word "Brat" published through Kamala's social media or other official communication channels regardless of capitalization (@KamalaHarris and @VP, would qualify however @KamalaHQ will not count).

Videos posted on her social media which were filmed outside this market's time frame will not qualify for a "Yes" resolution.

title: Will I believe that I have recently gotten creator bonuses from Mayor Pete in the VP market near the end of Friday?
body:
I currently believe that I’ve gotten no creator bonuses from Pat’s VP market. Resolves YES if on Friday my belief is that I have gotten some (in the month before Friday). I suspect if this happens it’ll be half of the trader’s fees, as that’s seemingly the current payoff method, but that exact ratio or payout calculation method is not required for a YES resolution.

In other words, if I believe that I have gotten any trading bonuses in the past month, whether I just sorta get a bunch on Thursday (or whenever), or someone convinces me that I was already getting them (I’d be surprised if this happens). Sorry I’m not phrasing this super clear, but I hope I got the point across.

If it becomes clear that answer adders aren’t supposed to get creator bonuses, I may resolve NO early.

It’s not ideal for my bottom line if I only got credited for creator bonuses from y’know whenever it’s fixed to Friday, but it would still count for a YES resolution. 

Relevant top level comment on VP market. I’m making this market cause I’m poor again, and somewhat salty I’m not getting bonuses for past me’s prescience. Well, also cause this seems like a bug!

I suspect if this happens it’ll be half of the trader’s fees, as that’s seemingly the current payoff method, but that exact ratio or payout calculation method is not required for a YES resolution.

In other words, if I believe that I have gotten any trading bonuses in the past month, whether I just sorta get a bunch on Thursday (or whenever), or someone convinces me that I was already getting them (I’d be surprised if this happens). Sorry I’m not phrasing this super clear, but I hope I got the point across.
If it becomes clear that answer adders aren’t supposed to get creator bonuses, I may resolve NO early.
It’s not ideal for my bottom line if I only got credited for creator bonuses from y’know whenever it’s fixed to Friday, but it would still count for a YES resolution.
Relevant
top level comment

title: Terror attack in Paris during the Olympics 2024?
If Harris wins, will the US use more than 5,000 TWh in 2028?
body:
This question resolves as N/A if Kamala Harris is not elected president in 2024.

The most recent data (2023) shows U.S. electricity consumption at 4,000 TWh.

A "Yes" resolution would represent a 25% increase over 5 years (2023-2028).

An increase of 1,000 TWh is equivalent to the energy consumption of approximately 11.4 AI clusters running at 10 GW each for a full year.

https://www.statista.com/statistics/201794/us-electricity-consumption-since-1975/

Trump version here:

title: Manifold lottery tickets 25x return possible
body:
I have placed No limit orders at 4%. If you are interested in this lottery, you can purchase as many Yes shares at 4% as you wish, provided my No limit orders do not run out. Or bet on NO if you looking for a +EV bet.

How the lottery will be decided:

I will roll a number from 1 to 28 using FairlyRandom at market close.

If the number rolled is 1, the market resolves as Yes. (All Yes buyers receive 25x return on their investment)

If the number rolled is not 1, the market resolves as No. (All Yes buyers get nothing)

The market closes after 7 days.

title: Will this market go below 51%?
body: Except for the first minutes of this market trading, if it goes below 51% even for a brief moment this market will resolve yes. Otherwise it will resolve no when it stays above or equals to 51%. So if the price ever trades 50% it will resolve yes.

title: Mysterious
Will I finish my WGU Bachelors Degree in time for Ft Worth Commencement
body:
I am currently accelerating through my BSSCOM through Western Governers University. The month of June I accelerated through 12 classes, most I had prior knowledge in. I am currently needing 11 more classes by September 20th to graduate and complete my degree. My goal is to walk the same time as my dad, who is graduating with his MBA. Figured this would be a fun way to motivate myself even more

Edit 7/29: 10 classes left. Also I will only purchase yes shares, should’ve said that from the beginning

title: Will Biden say "Jill" during his drop out speech? (Currently scheduled July 24)
body:
Joe Biden is scheduled to give a speech Wednesday July 24, about his decision to end his reelection campaign. This market refers to anything Biden says during the first speech he gives addressing his decision to withdraw from the Presidential race.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Biden says "Jill". Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No".

If Biden does not give a speech addressing his decision to withdraw from the Presidential race by July 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET this market will resolve to "No".

Any usage of the word regardless of context will count toward the resolution of this market.

Pluralization/possessive of the word will count toward the resolution of this market, however other forms will NOT count.

Compound words will count as long as "Jill" is part of the compound word and refers to the person Jill Biden.

The resolution source will be the video of the speech.

title: Will Deadpool & Wolverine have biggest opening weekend ever for R-rated movie? [ahead of Deadpool I & II, It, Joker]
body:
Analysts are projecting a huge opening weekend for "Deadpool x Wolverine" crossover movie.
https://deepnewz.com/movies/deadpool-wolverine-set-record-360m-global-opening-weekend-biggest-r-rated-debut

"""

The film, directed by Shawn Levy and starring Ryan Reynolds, is projected to earn between $340 million and $360 million globally in its opening weekend. This would mark the biggest opening weekend ever for an R-rated movie. Domestically, the film is expected to debut with $160 million to $170 million, making it the biggest R-rated opening of all-time.

"""

[image]The record for biggest opening weekend for an R-rated movie is the original Deadpool at $284.5M ($152.2M domestic).

https://www.hollywoodreporter.com/movies/movie-news/box-office-deadpool-makes-history-865143/

[image]
Will the new movie top these marks? It will probably be close...

It will certainly play at more theaters... Deadpool was a smash hit at the time, and a bit surprising.

Since BoxOfficeMojo is a bit weird on reporting international opening weekends -- it provides the raw numbers but aggregates them weirdly -- we will wait for Hollywood Reporter to let us know what the weekend opening was.

To clarify on resolution...
-> this market will resolve YES if Deadpool x Wolverine grosses more than $284.5M globally this opening weekend according to reports
-> AND the Hollywood Reporter (or equivalent publication) reports it as the record for an R-rated movie release

In other words the BoxOfficeMojo numbers should be seen as unofficial until there's confirmation in the Hollywood press. And the number we shoot for is >$284.5M internationally... this weekend

title: will particle reach to 0(No) or 10(Yes)?
body:
initial position of particle is 5
if number of traders at GMT midnight of each day is odd number then particle will move right(+1 to its current position) otherwise will move to the left(-1 to its current position)
if particle reach to 0 then it will be immediately resolved to "No"
if particle reach to 10 then it will be immediately resolved to "Yes"
if particle does not reach to the 0 or 10 at the end of market then it will be resolved to "No" if position<5 and to "Yes" otherwise

title: Will Joe Biden die by noon NY time on August 1?
Will anyone featured in this AI video shared by Elon Musk respond within 30 days of the post? (Aug 20)
body:
Elon Musk retweeted an AI video that some consider antagonistic - particularly toward Xi Jinping. See the bottom of this market for the original tweet/video.

The video features world leaders and prominent figures in outfits that can be considered insulting by some - Trump in an orange jumpsuit, Pelosi sponsored by the NYSE and NVDA, Putin in a rainbow (pride-inspired) strapless dress, Bill Clinton in blue chiffon (as in his portrait found in Jeffrey Epstein's house) and more.

The one that seems to have garnered the most attention and speculation in western media is a depiction of Xi Jinping in a jumpsuit with a Winnie the Pooh like figure on it.

see this market for a specific response from Xi Jinping:

Will Xi Jinping respond to this AI video shared by Elon Musk within 30 days of the post? (Aug 20)30%‌

Will any of the figures in this video acknowledge it, either with an official statement, in an interview, or similar clearly related to their feelings about the video? The statement can be positive, negative, or neutral but must be related to this video and not simply their feelings about Musk, his X posts, etc.

title: Will we get No Mana before we get no mana?
body:
Will EDM artist No Mana release a new original track before Manifold sells no mana on a given day?

No Mana (Jordan Orcaz) is an up-and-coming EDM artist. An acolyte of deadmau5 (Joel Zimmerman), he primarily released under the mau5trap label before mostly pivoting to Monstercat in 2022. The most recent original entry in his discography was the critically acclaimed album I Contain Flashing Images, which was released on May 30, 2024.

Mana is a unit of play money on Manifold, used to bet on and provide liquidity for prediction markets. Manifold offers purchase options for users who want more mana to throw around, and keeps track of its revenue from mana sales on its stats page (manifold.markets/stats). These mana sales average a few hundred dollars a day, but are highly variable and intermittent. Occasionally, Manifold may report no mana sales -- not a single dollar -- on a given day. The last time this happened was for May 8, 2024.

I am in the Pacific time zone. Beginning on July 23, 2024:

If Orcaz releases a new ORIGINAL track as No Mana and Manifold reports nonzero mana sales for that day, this market resolves YES. (This means that remixes or tracks Orcaz releases under other names, like isqa, will NOT count for the purposes of this market. I'll be checking Soundcloud and Spotify for new releases.)

If Manifold reports no mana sales for a day and Orcaz did not release a new original track as No Mana on that day, this market resolves NO. (This is according to manifold.markets/stats, which usually updates for the PREVIOUS day at 4a Pacific / 7a Eastern / 11 UTC. Dates on the page may be different for different users, so when in doubt, check the date May 8, 2024 on the 'Mana sales' graph, which should show $0. If not, mentally adjust the displayed date as necessary.)

If Orcaz releases a new original track as No Mana and Manifold reports no mana sales for that day, this market resolves 50% each to YES and NO.

If this market can no longer resolve YES -- for instance, if Orcaz permanently dissolves or renames No Mana -- it will immediately resolve NO, regardless of Manifold's mana sales up to that point. If Orcaz explicitly passes the No Mana name onto another person, this market will remain open, with all references to Orcaz replaced.

The fuse for this market could theoretically be very short or very long, but I expect it to resolve within a year.

I will not bet on this market.

title: Was Biden stepping down from re-election a coup?
body:
I will not bet on this market.

If there is any overwhelming evidence that the announcement of Biden stepping down from the 2024 presidential election was any of the following, this will resolve YES. Otherwise NO.

Biden did not personally sign the letter stating he was stepping down

Biden did not authorize any statement about him stepping down, or if he did it was done under duress (blackmail, etc)

Biden did not have Covid (e.g. it was used as an excuse to facilitate the coup)

The resolution criteria may be modified as things become more clear, including the resolution date. I will ultimately use my own judgement for the final resolution, which is why I won't bet myself.

title: Will Llama 3 405B know who I am?
body:
Claude 3 Opus knows who I am. It knows my favorite programming languages, my text editor, and when I ask questions like "What 20 approaches might [Mira] consider for Problem X?" a full 15-20% of its answers are uncommon techniques that are actually in my idea backlog. ("Dependently-typed genetic programming")

I'll test the model and see if it knows who I am, and resolve:

YES if I'm convinced it knows who I am

50% if I can't tell

NO if I'm convinced it doesn't know

N/A if I can't access Llama 3 405B by end of year

Claude 3 Opus is the only model I believe knows who I am; GPT-4, Llama 70B, Gemini 1.5 Pro, smaller Claude 3 models or Claude 3.5 Sonnet, none of them know who I am.

It doesn't need to link me to @Mira on Manifold Markets.

I won't bet in this market. 

I think it's unlikely this will resolve 50%.

I may not reveal the prompts I used if they would identify me.

I might wait for it to appear on Groq to test it.

title: Will the Green Party lose another MP by the end of August 2024?
body:
So far in the past two years the New Zealand Green party have lost several MPs. Here's a list:

Elizabeth Kerekere: accused of bullying

Golriz Ghahraman: shoplifting

James Shaw: resigned for personal reasons

Efeso Collins: sadly passed away after a charity run

Marama Davidson: on leave due to cancer

Julie Anne Genter: screaming at a minister in parliament  she apologised and is still a Green MP

Darleen Tana: involved in her husband's business that exploited migrant workers (she has been kicked out of the Greens and asked to resign, but is still in parliament)

I'm defining the Green Party losing an MP as the MP either leaving parliament, leaving the party, dying, or taking leave for an extended period of time. (I might update this within reason, depending on what happens)

Is this facebook marketplace studio a scam?
body:
Great studio for a decent price, found on Facebook Marketplace. An old woman says she had an operation so she can't meet up in person. She has a daughter who lives in a city 3 hours away by car, and drives to the studio to show us around. The last person that tried to lease the studio didn't show up to this meeting, according to the woman, which meant her busy daughter lost ~6 hours+ to driving. Because of this, the owner wants my partner to show she's "serious" about showing up and affording the place, and the way to do that is to give her the first and last month of rent before the meeting. In Canada there's a thing called interact e-transfer that easily lets people send one another money, and it has a password option so that the other person doesn't have access to the money until they get the password for the transfer. In theory as long as we send the money without the password, she wouldn't get the money before we send the lease, but this whole request is unusual.

some weirdnesses: 

We originally thought we wouldn't be able to use interact e-transfer, and said so, and the owner said we could use STEAM CARDs or ITHUNES CARDS instead, and said she's been using them to transfer money for years. That's potentially scammer-coded. 

She has some weird emails, mixes up details about meeting time (first it was monday or tuesday at 6pm, then it was at 7pm sharp), and her email changed from an email exchange to the next, from a typoed version of her name to a non-typoed with a @live.ca ending.

She has never shared the address after 15+ message exchanges

She in a hurry to rent the place, wants to get this done by end of weekend

However, ig it's a pretty elaborate story for a scam, and seems within the normal distribution of non-scammy fb marketplace interactions, and interact e-transfer seems to reduce the risks involved a lot.

Resolution: We'll make sure the password thing can't be bypassed, "send" the money, set up the meeting, see if the place is as advertised, and if I judge that it was a scam, the market will resolve YES, and NO otherwise. I won't bet.

content.text: Great studio for a decent price, found on Facebook Marketplace. An old woman says she had an operation so she can't meet up in person. She has a daughter who lives in a city 3 hours away by car, and drives to the studio to show us around. The last person that tried to lease the studio didn't show up to this meeting, according to the woman, which meant her busy daughter lost ~6 hours+ to driving. Because of this, the owner wants my partner to show she's "serious" about showing up and affording the place, and the way to do that is to give her the first and last month of rent before the meeting. In Canada there's a thing called interact e-transfer that easily lets people send one another money, and it has a password option so that the other person doesn't have access to the money until they get the password for the transfer. In theory as long as we send the money without the password, she wouldn't get the money before we send the lease, but this whole request is unusual.
some weirdnesses:

We originally thought we wouldn't be able to use interact e-transfer, and said so, and the owner said we could use STEAM CARDs or ITHUNES CARDS instead, and said she's been using them to transfer money for years. That's potentially scammer-coded.

She has some weird emails, mixes up details about meeting time (first it was monday or tuesday at 6pm, then it was at 7pm sharp), and her email changed from an email exchange to the next, from a typoed version of her name to a non-typoed with a @
live.ca

attrs.class: break-anywhere hover:underline hover:decoration-primary-400 hover:decoration-2 active:underline active:decoration-primary-400

content.text: ending.
She has never shared the address after 15+ message exchanges
She in a hurry to rent the place, wants to get this done by end of weekend

However, ig it's a pretty elaborate story for a scam, and seems within the normal distribution of non-scammy fb marketplace interactions, and interact e-transfer seems to reduce the risks involved a lot.

Resolution: We'll make sure the password thing can't be bypassed, "send" the money, set up the meeting, see if the place is as advertised, and if I judge that it was a scam, the market will resolve YES, and NO otherwise. I won't bet.

title: Will Evan Gershkovich be released from Russian prison by end of 2024?
body:
On July 19th, Wall Street Journal writer Evan Gershkovich was sentenced to 16 years in a Russian prison, on charges of espionage.
https://deepnewz.com/russia/russian-court-sentences-wsj-reporter-evan-gershkovich-to-16-years-high-security


[image]The US government has called for his release, as have media figures like Tucker Carlson. In his interview with Putin, Tucker asked for Gershkovich's release. Putin said that this is a matter between intelligence services, as the journalist was clearly also a spy. Indicating both his willingness to negotiate, but also that the US needed to give something for his release.

While it seems unlikely the Gershkovich will serve a large portion of his sentence, will he be released by end of 2024?

The market will resolve as YES if
 Gershkovich is released from Russian custody by end of 2024

 OR if that is announced and confirmed by the Russian government OR strong sourcing outside of the government [specifically the Wall Street Journal or equivalent]

In other words, after the election (or possibly before) -- will a deal be reached to release Evan Gershkovich from Russian custody, to return to the US.

If he dies in custody -- G-d forbid -- the market will resolve as NO.

Pacific time. Things like airports, banks, hospitals, 911, etc. The 75% is subjective, if it isn't obvious me, Joshua, and Semiotic will resolve it by consensus. My current intent is this is about public-facing functionality people use, things that users will notice. If a bunch of internal services for analytics or something are still down but users see a service that works we can't really measure that!

title: Am I being stupid? Or Is something wrong with my manifold p&l?
body:
Probably I’m being stupid. But I’m pretty short Biden and long other democratic politicians getting the nomination, and for about a week or so, my league standings have run inverse to the news.  So for instance on a day when my balance sheet shows me up 2k mana, I’m down 2k in my league. Im long Gretchen Whitmer but I go down in the league each time her stock goes up. 

I don’t have any other positions that would account for this problem.  

Resolves yes if I’m being stupid and realize I’m being stupid in the next two weeks. 

Resolves no if there something wrong with my account (very unlikely) or some global glitch (probably also unlikely) or the problem just goes away on its own in the next day or two. 

I might bet on this even though it’s totally subjective.

title: Is Biden winning in 538’s forecast because of a bug? (announced by end of August)
body:
Laughably, the Morris zombie 538 forecast still gives Biden a 52% chance to win (as of July 18) in a 2024 matchup against Trump. Many have criticized this result, because it makes no sense when Trump is leading polls in swing states by this much. 

In particular, an anomaly was observed in the Wisconsin model, where the polls portion of the model predicts Trump+2.7, the fundamentals portion predicts Biden+0.2, and the combination yields Biden+1.2. Morris said something about inter-state correlations that is confusing, and claims not to have time to illuminate us on why his model is really reasonable. 

Nate Silver writeup on the topic: https://www.natesilver.net/p/why-i-dont-buy-538s-new-election?r=2bgblo&utm_campaign=post&utm_medium=web

His model is new this year, so it’s possible there was a bug. 

This market resolves YES if, by end of August, a bug in the code of the 538 presidential election model is announced, and if the bug fix was retroactively applied to now, Biden would have a <50% chance to win. Resolves NO at end of August otherwise. 

General policy for my markets: In the rare event of a conflict between my resolution criteria and the agreed-upon common-sense spirit of the market, I may resolve it according to the market's spirit or N/A, probably after discussion.
